briefTitle: Safety and Efficacy Study of Autologous Fibroblasts in the Treatment of Severe Facial Acne Scarring
officialTitle: A Phase II/III Double-Blind, Randomized, Placebo-Controlled Trial of the Safety and Efficacy of Isolagen Therapy in the Treatment of Moderate to Sever Facial Acne Scarring
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety profile and the treatment effect of Isolagen TherapyTM and placebo when administered to facial acne scars.

primaryOutcome.measure: Evaluator Live Acne Scarring Assessment Responders
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Baseline (prior to first treatment) and four months after last treatment
